thread.title: BRIEF-Matthews International Acquires Star Granite & Bronze For $41.2 Million

title: BRIEF-Matthews International Acquires Star Granite & Bronze For $41.2 Million

organizations.name: brief-matthews international acquires star granite & bron
brief-matthews international acquires star granite & bronze

text:
February 1, 2018 / 6:25 PM / in 25 minutes BRIEF-Matthews International Acquires Star Granite & Bronze For $41.2 Million Reuters Staff 
Feb 1 (Reuters) - Matthews International Corp: 
* MATTHEWS INTERNATIONAL ANNOUNCES ACQUISITION OF STAR GRANITE & BRONZE * MATTHEWS INTERNATIONAL CORP - DEAL FOR $41.2 MILLION 
* MATTHEWS INTERNATIONAL CORP - PLANS TO INTEGRATE STAR WITHIN ITS MATTHEWS CEMETERY PRODUCTS BUSINESS, PART OF ITS MEMORIALIZATION SEGMENT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
